item.title: How I cook Ctags in Vim
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Ctags is great piece of software. And it took me some time to realize how I can use ctags with vim in optimal for me way. My solution is petty simle. I have few vim functions that vim runs when buffer write is done.
